verses.verse: O Lord <S%H3068><s%> our Lord <S%H113><s%>, how excellent <S%H117><s%> is your name <S%H8034><s%> in all the earth <S%H776><s%>! who have set <S%H5414><s%> your glory <S%H1935><s%> above the heavens <S%H8064><s%>.

Out of the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of babes <S%H5768><s%> and sucklings <S%H3243><s%> have you ordained <S%H3245><s%> strength <S%H5797><s%> because of your enemies <S%H6887><s%>, that you might still <S%H7673><s%> the enemy <S%H341><s%> and the avenger <S%H5358><s%>.

When I consider <S%H7200><s%> your heavens <S%H8064><s%>, the work <S%H4639><s%> of your fingers <S%H676><s%>, the moon <S%H3394><s%> and the stars <S%H3556><s%>, which you have ordained <S%H3559><s%>;
What is man <S%H582><s%>, that you are mindful <S%H2142><s%> of him <S%H1121><s%>? and the son of man <S%H120><s%>, that you visit him <S%H6485><s%>?
For you have made him a little <S%H4592><s%> lower <S%H2637><s%> than the angels <S%H430><s%>, and have crowned <S%H5849><s%> him with glory <S%H3519><s%> and honor <S%H1926><s%>.
You made him to have dominion <S%H4910><s%> over the works <S%H4639><s%> of your hands <S%H3027><s%>; you have put <S%H7896><s%> all things under his feet <S%H7272><s%>:
All sheep <S%H6792><s%> and oxen <S%H504><s%>, Yes <S%H929><s%>, and the animals of the field <S%H7704><s%>;
The bird <S%H6833><s%> of the air <S%H8064><s%>, and the fish <S%H1709><s%> of the sea <S%H3220><s%>, and whatever passes through <S%H5674><s%> the paths <S%H734><s%> of the seas <S%H3220><s%>.
O Lord <S%H3068><s%> our Lord <S%H113><s%>, how excellent <S%H117><s%> is your name <S%H8034><s%> in all the earth <S%H776><s%>!
